channel.title: Dragonscape
channel.description:
Yeh it was a fun server but I could never put it on enough so I quite. Whenever you see something like this it is DragonScape. I didn't put a some gay anti-leach code in because no body likes them. Enjoy
I will only post this on Mopar so any where else is a leach. You do not have to give any credit to me.
Latest Updates:
90% Slayer 100% Smithing, woodcutting, firemaking, mining, fishing, cooking, agility 100% Ancients + normal magic Dupe fixed More NPCs More areas More objects More teleports More portals More mini-games
Latest Pictures:
[img]http://img21.imageshack.us/img21/1003/18052225.png[/img]
[img]http://img7.imageshack.us/img7/583/62139814.png[/img]
[img]http://img26.imageshack.us/img26/8140/16632545.png[/img]
[img]http://img14.imageshack.us/img14/567/32941491.png[/img]
[img]http://img14.imageshack.us/img14/8310/57270499.png[/img]
Smithing was coded 100% by me, you must have a hammer to make the bar in to armor!
[img]http://img5.imageshack.us/img5/9969/smith.png[/img]
[img]http://img10.imageshack.us/img10/884/icea.png[/img]
You need a anti fire shield when killing drags or you get pwned
[img]http://img9.imageshack.us/img9/4785/drag2.png[/img]
[img]http://img9.imageshack.us/img9/8278/dragm.png[/img]
Download: http://tigerden.uppit.com/save/5d4a6fd11d6fefefa8cc7409d8e1dcd1/4a795d63/0209/rvis4i3i/DragonScape.zip

Me (xDragonPkzx) Delta Others
